AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type on to active or off to deactive)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact will be read messages automatically(type on to active or off to deactive)

ANTICALL.description: Enter on for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter on for your bot to auto like status

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type on to put your bot on public mode or off to put it on private mode

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (put the name you put on top)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of kenya '254')

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put off else put on

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 online. 2 typing a message. 3 recording . Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTIDELETE_PUBLIC.description: Show deleted messages publicly in chat (on = show to everyone, off = disabled)

ANTIDELETE_DM.description: Forward deleted messages to bot owner in DM (on = send to owner, off = disabled)

AUTO_BIO.description: Enable automatic bio update (on = active, off = deactive)
